summary: In 2005, Mitch Mustain was the top high school quarterback in America; the first ever consensus Gatorade, Parade, and USA Today Player of the Year. He began his college career with eight consecutive victories. Then, momentum stopped.
cast: Mitch Mustain|Nolan Richardson|Joe Schad|Bo Mattingly|Clint Stoerner|Mike Irwin|Ben Cleveland|Kurt Voigt|Matt Mustain
title: The Identity Theft of Mitch Mustain
